metadata.title: CVE-2021-22147 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Before 7.14.0. A flaw was discovered in Elasticsearch where document and field level security was not applied tosearchable snapshots. This could lead to an authenticated user gaining access to information that theyare unauthorized to view

criterions.comment: elasticsearch package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
